description: Multiple LiveData observers registered causing duplicate events or incorrect state updates.
commonCauses: Observer registered in onStart/onResume instead of onCreate
Fragment observing same LiveData multiple times
Observing in both Fragment and Activity
Using observe() in onCreateView every time
Lambda creating new observer instance each call
solutions: Register observers once in onCreate or Fragment.onViewCreated
Use viewLifecycleOwner in Fragments to auto-remove on view destroy
Remove observer before re-registering if needed
Use distinctUntilChanged to avoid duplicate values
Observe ViewModel LiveData, not raw data sources
prevention: Use viewLifecycleOwner for Fragment view observations
Test configuration changes to verify single observer
Use SingleLiveEvent or Event wrapper for one-shot events
Monitor observer count in debug builds
Use Transformations.map/switchMap to avoid multiple observers
